attributes.action: to set aside 3 per cent (approx. £40m pa) of the ‘good causes’ funds raised through the National Lottery to directly support hospice care in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While adult hospices receive only 35 per cent funding from the Government, children’s hospices receive just 5 per cent. The rest has to come from the kindness, generosity and humanity of people willing to give their time, money and commitment into providing an essential service for those with life limiting illnesses. 

Whilst not precluding hospices from applying for individual Lottery grants, if just 3 per cent of the money set aside from the National Lottery ‘good causes’ pot (approx £40m pa) were dedicated to supporting hospice care in this country, it would make a real difference in meeting the ongoing costs of providing this essential service.
